en.purpose: To evaluate the clinical criteria required to establish whether a patient with breast cancer should be recommended genetic testing.
en.use:
Use to determine whether a patient with breast cancer meets the recommendation criteria for genetic testing.

The guideline determines eligibility by assessing age at first breast cancer diagnosis, number of breast cancer cases among close relatives, triple-negative breast cancer status, male breast cancer, ovarian/fallopian/peritoneal carcinoma, criteria for other hereditary cancer syndromes, and whether a test result would directly influence current cancer treatment.

This guideline does not calculate genetic risk, it only determines whether testing should be recommended.
en.misuse:
Not to be used for recording results of genetic tests or variant classifications.
Not to be used for general hereditary risk assessment unrelated to breast cancer.
